title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label, so it cannot contain a mnemonic. The system does not allow multiple selections, but move up / down can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview is not wrapping properly. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned properly with the dialog top. The table should have a label to support a mnemonic. The system should allow multiple selections so that move up / down can be applied to multiple items. The signature preview should wrap properly. The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: To reproduce the issue, change the parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
